thread.section_title: MobileZap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MobileZap | mobilezap.com.au
thread.title: Kevin Reilly

author: Kevin Reilly
title: Kevin Reilly
text: When things go wrong the way they are handled is the best test of customer service. I accidentally double ordered when my PC spat the dummy at the most crucial part of my order. The customer service department was great at sorting my dilemma regardless of the fact it was a small transaction. The extra item ordered was mailed back and a few days later my money was refunded. Reassuring to have a Net based retailer being so prompt and transparent. Many thanks.
